    • Method Detail

      • getStudiosList

        org.json.simple.JSONArray getStudiosList(java.lang.String status)
        It will get all the studios from database based on the given status.
        Parameters:
        status - a string may have the value of active or inactive.
        Returns:
        It will return all active studios list.

      • getStudioProfile

        org.json.simple.JSONObject getStudioProfile(int stdid)
                                            throws com.mashape.unirest.http.exceptions.UnirestException
        Returns client response that holds details of studio based on passed studio id.
        Parameters:
        stdid - the primary key of studio.
        Returns:
        it will return details of studio.
        Throws:
        com.mashape.unirest.http.exceptions.UnirestException - a runtime exception happens while accessing studio's instagram account.

      • isStudioExist

        boolean isStudioExist(int stdid)
        Used to check whether studio exist or not. It will return true if studio exist otherwise return false.
        Parameters:
        stdid - the primary key od studio.
        Returns:
        boolean true or false.

      • saveStudio

        org.json.simple.JSONObject saveStudio(int stdId,
                                    java.lang.String stdName,
                                    java.lang.String stdTradeName,
                                    java.lang.String stdAddr1,
                                    java.lang.String stdAddr2,
                                    java.lang.String stdAddr3,
                                    java.lang.String stdTown,
                                    java.lang.String stdCounty,
                                    java.lang.String stdCountry,
                                    java.lang.String stdPostcode,
                                    java.lang.String stdBAddr1,
                                    java.lang.String stdBAddr2,
                                    java.lang.String stdBAddr3,
                                    java.lang.String stdBTown,
                                    java.lang.String stdBCounty,
                                    java.lang.String stdBCountry,
                                    java.lang.String stdBPostcode,
                                    java.lang.String stdCompHouseNo,
                                    java.lang.String stdVatno,
                                    java.lang.String stdCompLogo,
                                    java.lang.String stdImgurl,
                                    float f,
                                    float g,
                                    java.lang.String stdsiteurl,
                                    java.lang.String creby,
                                    java.util.Date date,
                                    java.lang.String modby,
                                    java.util.Date date2,
                                    java.lang.String desc,
                                    java.lang.String phone,
                                    java.lang.String mail,
                                    java.lang.String status,
                                    java.lang.String type,
                                    java.lang.String pamAuthId,
                                    java.lang.String pamAuthToken,
                                    int points,
                                    int timeSpent,
                                    java.lang.String streamDesc)
        This method used to add new studio or update existing studio into database. It will return a studio id (primary key) of just inserted or updated studio.
        Parameters:
        stdId - the primary key of studio.
        stdName - name of studio.
        stdTradeName - trade name of studio.
        stdAddr1 - studio address line 1.
        stdAddr2 - studio address line 2
        stdAddr3 - studio address line 3
        stdTown - studio town.
        stdCounty - studio county.
        stdCountry - studio country.
        stdPostcode - studio post code.
        stdBAddr1 - studio business address line 1.
        stdBAddr2 - studio business address line 2.
        stdBAddr3 - studio business address line 3.
        stdBTown - studio business town.
        stdBCounty - studio business county.
        stdBCountry - studio business country.
        stdBPostcode - studio post code.
        stdCompHouseNo - studio company house number
        stdVatno - studio VAT number
        stdCompLogo - studios logo
        stdImgurl - studios image location
        f - studios latitude
        g - studios longitude
        stdsiteurl - studio site url
        creby - created party
        date - created date
        modby - modified party
        date2 - modified date
        desc - description about studio
        phone - studios phone number
        mail - studios mail id
        status - status of a studio
        type - studio type
        pamAuthId - instagrams authentication id.
        pamAuthToken - instagrams authetications token
        points - number of pointer credited to user on each checkin
        timeSpent - minimum time to be spent in studio
        streamDesc - descriptions appears on stream page.
        Returns:
        Returns JSONObject contains recently inserted record id.

      • doStudioSearch

        org.json.simple.JSONArray doStudioSearch(java.lang.String search)
        It will search and get list of all studios from database when it found the matched string.
        Parameters:
        search - search string.
        Returns:
        return JSONArray contains information about studios.
